trans-unit.source: Provides access to the functionality of an installed speech synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Tillhandahåller åtkomst till funktionerna i en sammanfattande installerade tal-motor.

trans-unit.source: When you create a new SpeechSynthesizer object, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar ett nytt SpeechSynthesizer-objekt använder du standard system röst.

trans-unit.source: To configure the SpeechSynthesizer to use one of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurera SpeechSynthesizer att använda någon av de installera tal sammanfattande (text till tal) rösterna med den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>metod.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill ha information om vilka röster installeras med hjälp av <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>metoden och <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>klass.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class also provides control over the following aspects of speech synthesis: - To configure the output for the SpeechSynthesizer object, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Den här klassen ger också kontroll över följande aspekter av tal sammanfattande: – Om du vill konfigurera utdata för objektet SpeechSynthesizer använder den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, och <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To generate speech, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Om du vill generera tal, använder de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metod.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SpeechSynthesizer can produce speech from text, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object, or from [Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesizer kan producera tal från text, en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>-objektet, eller från [tal sammanfattande Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>

trans-unit.source: - To pause and resume speech synthesis, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: -Om du vill pausa och återuppta tal sammanfattande, använda på <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>och <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To add or remove lexicons, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: -Om du vill lägga till eller ta bort lexikon, använda på <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>och <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SpeechSynthesizer can use one or more lexicons to guide its pronunciation of words.
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesizer kan använda en eller flera lexikon hjälper dess uttal ord..

trans-unit.source: - To modify the delivery of speech output, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Rate%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Volume%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: -Om du vill ändra leveransen av utgående tal, använder den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Rate%2A>och <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Volume%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Volume%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Rate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SpeechSynthesizer raises events when it encounters certain features in prompts: (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>).
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesizer genererar händelser när den stöter på vissa funktioner i anvisningarna: (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>, och <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>).</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>

trans-unit.source: It also raises events that report on the start (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>) and end (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>) of speak operations and on the change of the speaking voice (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>).
trans-unit.target: Den också genererar händelser som rapporterar på start (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>) och slutdatum (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>) av tala operations och ändring av rösten (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>).</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the SpeechSynthesizer.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid anropet <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose%2A>innan du släpper ditt senaste referens till SpeechSynthesizer.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the SpeechSynthesizer object's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Annars resurser den använder frigörs inte förrän skräpinsamlingen anropar objektet SpeechSynthesizer <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metod.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: When you initialize a new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instance, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: När du initierar en ny <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>instans, används standardvärdet system röst.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To configure the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> to use one of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Så här konfigurerar du den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>Om du vill använda en av de installera tal sammanfattande (text till tal) rösterna den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>metod.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill ha information om vilka röster installeras med hjälp av <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>metoden och <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>klass.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adds a lexicon to the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till en lexikonet till den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: A pronunciation lexicon is a collection of words or phrases together with their pronunciations, which consist of letters and characters from a supported phonetic alphabet.
trans-unit.target: En uttal lexikonet är en samling med ord eller fraser tillsammans med deras uttal, som består av bokstäver och tecken från en stöds fonetiskt alfabet.

trans-unit.source: You can use a lexicon to specify custom pronunciations for specialized vocabulary in your application.
trans-unit.target: Du kan använda en lexikonet för att ange anpassade uttal för särskilda ordförråd i ditt program.

trans-unit.source: Pronunciations specified in an external lexicon file take precedence over the pronunciations of the speech synthesizer's internal lexicon or dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Uttal som angetts i en extern lexikonet filen åsidosätter uttal för tal-synthesizer interna lexikonet eller ordlista.

trans-unit.source: However, pronunciations specified inline in prompts created with any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsmlMarkup%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsml%2A> methods take precedence over pronunciations specified in any lexicon.
trans-unit.target: Dock uttal angetts infogad i frågor som skapats med någon av de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsmlMarkup%2A>, eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsml%2A>metoder företräde framför uttal som anges i alla lexikonet.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsmlMarkup%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A>

trans-unit.source: Inline pronunciations apply only to a single occurrence of a word.
trans-unit.target: Infogade uttal gäller endast för en enskild förekomst av ett ord.

trans-unit.source: See [Lexicons and Phonetic Alphabets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se [lexikon och fonetiskt alfabet](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) för mer information.

trans-unit.source: You can add multiple lexicons to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object.Two values are currently supported for the `mediaType` parameter: - The value `application/pls+xml` indicates that the lexicon conforms to the [Pronunciation Lexicon Specification (PLS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201766).
trans-unit.target: Du kan lägga till flera lexikon ett <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>-objekt. Två värden för närvarande stöds för den `mediaType` parameter:-värdet `application/pls+xml` anger att lexikonet överensstämmer med den [uttal lexikonet specifikationen (PLS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201766).</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred format to use.
trans-unit.target: Detta är det önskade formatet.

trans-unit.source: - The value `application/vdn.ms-sapi-lex` indicates that the lexicon format is Uncompressed Lexicon, which is a Microsoft-proprietary format.
trans-unit.target: -Värdet `application/vdn.ms-sapi-lex` anger att formatet lexikonet är okomprimerade lexikonet, vilket är ett Microsoft-generiska-format.

trans-unit.source: This is a legacy format and we recommend that you use the PLS format described above.
trans-unit.target: Detta är ett äldre format och vi rekommenderar att du använder formatet PLS som beskrivs ovan.

trans-unit.source: The location of the lexicon information.
trans-unit.target: Platsen för informationen lexikonet.

trans-unit.source: The media type of the lexicon.
trans-unit.target: Medietyp för lexikonet.

trans-unit.source: Media type values are not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: Media värden av typen är inte skiftlägeskänsliga.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Utlöses när den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> påträffar ett bokmärke i Kommandotolken.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event while processing any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>skapat händelsen under bearbetning av någon av de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Information om data som är associerade med händelsen finns <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can add bookmarks using the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendBookmark%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan lägga till bokmärken med den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendBookmark%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendBookmark%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object and releases resources used during the session.
trans-unit.target: Förfogar den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objekt och versioner av de resurser som används under sessionen.

trans-unit.source: Acts as a safeguard to clean up resources in the event that the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose*> method is not called.
trans-unit.target: Fungerar som ett skydd att rensa resurser i händelse av att den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose*>metoden inte anropas.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the prompt that the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> is speaking.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar frågan som den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> är tal.

trans-unit.source: Returns the prompt object that is currently being spoken.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar den fråga objekt som läses för närvarande.

trans-unit.source: Returns all of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar alla installerade tal röster sammanfattande (text till tal).

trans-unit.source: A voice is an engine for speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) that is installed on the system.
trans-unit.target: En röst är en motor för taligenkänning sammanfattande (text till tal eller TTS) som är installerad på systemet.

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of the voices currently installed on the system.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en skrivskyddad samling röster installerad på systemet.

trans-unit.source: Returns all of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices that support a specific locale.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar alla installerade tal sammanfattande (text till tal) röster som har stöd för ett specifikt språk.

trans-unit.source: If none of the installed voices support the specified locale, this method returns an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Om inget stöd för installerade rösterna angivna språkvariant i den här metoden returnerar en tom samling.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows och System.Speech API acceptera alla giltiga språk-landskoder.

trans-unit.source: To perform text-to-speech using the language specified in the Culture property, a speech synthesis engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: En sammanfattande tal-motor som stöder den språk landskoden måste vara installerat för att utföra text till tal med det språk som anges i egenskapen kultur.

trans-unit.source: The speech synthesis engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes: - en-US.
trans-unit.target: Tal sammanfattande engines som levereras med Microsoft Windows 7 fungerar med följande språk – landskoder:-en-US.

trans-unit.source: English (United States) - zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: Engelska (USA) - zh-CN.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China) - zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: Kinesiska (Kina) - zh-TW.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan) Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: Kinesiska (Taiwan) två bokstäver språkkoder, till exempel "SV" får heller.

trans-unit.source: The locale that the voice must support.
trans-unit.target: Det språk som måste ha stöd för röst.

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of the voices currently installed on the system that support the specified locale.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en skrivskyddad samling röster som för närvarande är installerad på datorn som har stöd för det angivna språket.

trans-unit.source: Pauses the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Pausar de <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: Raised when a phoneme is reached.
trans-unit.target: Utlöses när en phoneme har uppnåtts.

trans-unit.source: A phoneme is a basic component of written language, typically a letter of an alphabet (or the combination of two letters) that represents one or more distinct sounds.
trans-unit.target: En phoneme är en grundläggande komponent i skriftliga språk, vanligtvis en bokstav en alfabetet (eller en kombination av två bokstäver) som representerar ett eller flera distinkta ljud.

trans-unit.source: For example, the letter “c” is a phoneme that may sound like “s” in “cinder”, or like “k” in “catch”.
trans-unit.target: Bokstaven "c" är till exempel en phoneme kan låta som "s" i "cinder" eller "k" i "catch".

trans-unit.source: A written word is an assemblage of phonemes.
trans-unit.target: Ett skriftligt ord är en grupp av fonemen.

trans-unit.source: Changing a phoneme in a word will alter its spelling.
trans-unit.target: Ändra en phoneme i word ändrar dess stavning.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instance generates a PhonemeReached event for each portion of a word that constitutes a phoneme.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>instans genererar en PhonemeReached händelse för varje del av ett ord som utgör en phoneme.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For example, for the word “theme” would generate three PhonemeReached events; one for the “th” sound, one for the “e” sound, and one for the “m” sound (me).
trans-unit.target: Till exempel skulle ordet "tema" generera för tre PhonemeReached händelser. en för ljudet: "e", ett för "e" ljud och ett för "m" ljud (me).

trans-unit.source: For an example and information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Ett exempel och information om data som är associerade med händelsen finns <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the speaking rate of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger engelskspråkiga frekvensen för den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: Returns the speaking rate of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object, from -10 through 10.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar engelskspråkiga frekvensen för den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objekt från 10 och 10.

trans-unit.source: Removes a lexicon from the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Tar bort ett lexikon från den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A> for an example.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>ett exempel.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>

trans-unit.source: The location of the lexicon document.
trans-unit.target: Platsen för dokumentet lexikonet.

trans-unit.source: Resumes the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object after it has been paused.
trans-unit.target: Återupptar den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objekt när den har pausats.

trans-unit.source: Selects a specific voice by name.
trans-unit.target: Väljer en viss röst efter namn.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select.
trans-unit.target: Använd den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>metoden och <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>klassen om du vill hämta namnen på installerat tal röster som du kan välja.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a voice, pass the entire contents of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A> property as the argument for the SelectVoice method.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill välja en röst skickar hela innehållet i den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A>egenskapen som argument för metoden SelectVoice.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object selects the first installed voice that contains `name` in the voice's <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>objekt väljer den första installerade röst som innehåller `name` i rösten <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskap.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> performs a case-sensitive, substring comparison to determine if the voice matches the `name`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>jämförelsen skiftlägeskänslig, delsträngen för att avgöra om rösten matchar den `name`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: When an application calls <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria.
trans-unit.target: När ett program anropar <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, metoden kontrollerar att var och en av de röster som påträffas i registret uppfyller vissa angivna krav.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: For any voice that fails verification, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> sets its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property to `False`.
trans-unit.target: För varje röst som misslyckas verifiering <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>anger dess <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>egenskapen `False`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: An application cannot select a voice whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property is `False`.
trans-unit.target: Ett program kan inte välja en röst vars <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>egenskapen är `False`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, applications will not set a voice’s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Normalt program inte anger en röst <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>egenskap.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a voice by gender, age, or locale, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill välja en röst av kön, ålder eller språk, kan du använda en av de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the voice to select.
trans-unit.target: Namnet på röst att välja.

trans-unit.source: Selects a voice with a specific gender.
trans-unit.target: Väljer en röst med en specifik kön.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select.

trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>objekt väljer den första installerade rösten vars <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A>egenskapen matchar den `gender` parameter.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.target: Om du vill välja en röst baserat på andra egenskaper, finns det andra <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object finds installed voices whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A> properties match the `gender` and `age` parameters.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>objekt söker efter installerade voices vars <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A>och <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A>Egenskaper matchar det `gender` och `age` parametrar.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> counts the matches it finds, and returns the voice when the count equals the `voiceAlternate` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>räknar matchar den söker efter och returnerar rösten när antalet är lika med den `voiceAlternate` parameter.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To select a voice by name, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Markera en röst efter namn genom att använda den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>

trans-unit.source: The gender of the voice to select.
trans-unit.target: Röst att välja kön.

trans-unit.source: The age of the voice to select.

trans-unit.source: The position of the voice to select.
trans-unit.target: Positionen för röst att välja.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object finds voices whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Culture%2A> properties match the `gender`, `age`, and `culture` parameters.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> counts the matches it finds, and returns the voice when the count equals the `voiceAlternate` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>räknar matchar den söker efter och returnerar rösten när antalet är lika med den `voiceAlternate` parameter.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows och System.Speech API acceptera alla giltiga språk-landskoder.

trans-unit.source: To perform text-to-speech using the language specified in the `culture` parameter, a speech synthesis engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: Att utföra text till tal med det språk som anges i den `culture` parametern, en sammanfattande tal-motor som stöder språk landskod måste vara installerad.

trans-unit.source: The speech synthesis engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes: - en-US.
trans-unit.target: Tal sammanfattande engines som levereras med Microsoft Windows 7 fungerar med följande språk – landskoder:-en-US.

trans-unit.source: English (United States) - zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: Engelska (USA) - zh-CN.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China) - zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: Kinesiska (Kina) - zh-TW.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan) Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: Kinesiska (Taiwan) två bokstäver språkkoder, till exempel "SV" får heller.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object to append output to an audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurerar den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objekt att lägga till utdata till en ljudström.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the asynchronous synthesis operation for a queued prompt.
trans-unit.target: Avbryter åtgärden asynkron sammanfattande för Kommandotolken i kö.

trans-unit.source: You can also use this method to cancel an asynchronous speak operation for the following: - The contents of a <xref:System.String> specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan också använda den här metoden för att avbryta en asynkron tala åtgärden för följande:-innehållet i en <xref:System.String>anges av en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metod.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: - The contents of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: -Innehållet i en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>anges av en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metod.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>

trans-unit.source: - The contents of a <xref:System.String> containing SSML specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Innehållet i en <xref:System.String>som innehåller SSML som anges av en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metod.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>, System.Speech creates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object and populates it with the contents of the method's parameter, and returns the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object.
trans-unit.target: När du anropar <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>, System.Speech skapar en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>objekt fylls med innehållet i metodens parameter och returnerar det <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you retain a copy of the returned <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>, you can pass it into SpeakAsyncCancel to cancel speaking content specified in a <xref:System.String> or a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: Om du behåller en kopia av den returnerade <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>, du kan skicka det till SpeakAsyncCancel att avbryta engelskspråkiga innehåll som angetts i en <xref:System.String>eller en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>

trans-unit.source: The content for which to cancel a speak operation.
trans-unit.target: Innehåll som du vill avbryta en speak.

trans-unit.source: Cancels all queued, asynchronous, speech synthesis operations.
trans-unit.target: Avbryter alla köade, asynkront, tal sammanfattande åtgärder.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> completes the speaking of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Utlöses när den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> har slutförts tal om en fråga.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises the SpeakCompleted event at the completion of any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>genererar SpeakCompleted händelse vid slutförandet av någon av de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs> class has no properties, and does not return data from the SpeakCompleted event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs>klassen har inga egenskaper och inte returnera data från händelsen SpeakCompleted.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the SpeakCompleted event.
trans-unit.target: Den tillhandahålls för att aktivera programmet författare att skriva händelsehanterare för händelsen SpeakCompleted.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Raised after the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> speaks each individual word of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Upphöjt efter den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> talar ord. i Kommandotolken.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event for each new word that it speaks in a prompt using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>genererar den här händelsen för varje ny ord som programmet använder en fråga med någon av de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For an example and more information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Ett exempel och mer information om data som är associerade med händelsen finns <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Synchronously speaks a <xref:System.String> that contains SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: Synkront talar en <xref:System.String>som innehåller SSML markup.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The contents of the `textToSpeak` parameter must include a `speak` element and must conform to the [Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).
trans-unit.target: Innehållet i den `textToSpeak` parameter måste innehålla en `speak` element och måste följa den [tal sammanfattande Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Speech Synthesis Markup Language Reference](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [tal sammanfattande Markup Language Reference](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94).

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously speak a string that contains SSML markup, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill asynkront tala en sträng som innehåller SSML markeringar, använda den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> to initiate the synchronous speaking of a string that does not contain SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: Du kan använda <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>att initiera synkrona tal om en sträng som inte innehåller SSML markup.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application dos not need to perform tasks while speaking, you can use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> method to generate speech synchronously.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> begins the speaking of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Utlöses när den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> börjar tal om en fråga.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event when it begins processing a prompt using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>genererar den här händelsen när den påbörjar bearbetningen av en fråga med någon av de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> class has no properties, and does not return data from the SpeakStarted event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs>klassen har inga egenskaper och inte returnera data från händelsen SpeakStarted.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the SpeakStarted event.
trans-unit.target: Den tillhandahålls för att aktivera programmet författare att skriva händelsehanterare för händelsen SpeakStarted.

trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current speaking state of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar aktuellt tala tillståndet för den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: To get the new state of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> after it changes, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Att hämta den nya statusen på <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>ändringarna, efter att det använder <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A>egenskapen för <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: Returns the current speaking state of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar det aktuella engelskspråkiga tillståndet för den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the state of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Utlöses när tillståndet för den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> ändringar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event when its speaking <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A> changes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>genererar den här händelsen när dess tala <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A>ändringar.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For an example and more information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Ett exempel och mer information om data som är associerade med händelsen finns <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To pause and resume speech synthesis, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill pausa och återuppta tal sammanfattande, använda på <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>och <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Raised when a viseme is reached.
trans-unit.target: Utlöses när en viseme har uppnåtts.

trans-unit.source: A viseme is the basic position of the mouth and face when pronouncing a phoneme.
trans-unit.target: En viseme är grundläggande positionen för munnen och står inför när uttala en phoneme.

trans-unit.source: Visemes are visual representations of phonemes.
trans-unit.target: Visemes är visuella representationer av fonemen.

trans-unit.source: System.Speech supports 21 visemes for US English, each of which corresponds to one or more phonemes.
trans-unit.target: System.Speech stöder 21 visemes för amerikansk engelska, som motsvarar en eller flera fonemen.

trans-unit.source: VisemeReached events are raised when a new phoneme reached has a different corresponding viseme than the previous phoneme reached.
trans-unit.target: VisemeReached händelser aktiveras när en ny phoneme nå har en annan motsvarande viseme än tidigare phoneme uppnåtts.

trans-unit.source: Since some visemes represent more than one phoneme, a VisemeReached event is not generated if the next phoneme reached corresponds to the same viseme as the previous phoneme.
trans-unit.target: Eftersom vissa visemes representerar mer än en phoneme, en VisemeReached händelse genereras om nästa phoneme uppnåtts motsvarar samma viseme som tidigare phoneme.

trans-unit.source: For example, for the spoken words “this zone”, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> event is raised for the “s” in “this” and the “z” in “zone”.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel för orden "den här zonen" en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>händelsen utlöses för "s" i "denna" och "z" i "zonen".</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>

trans-unit.source: However, a VisemeReached event is not raised for the “z” in “zone” because it corresponds to the same viseme as the “s” in “this”.
trans-unit.target: En VisemeReached händelse utlöses dock inte för "z" i "zonen" eftersom det motsvarar samma viseme som "s" i "denna".

trans-unit.source: The following is a list of the 21 SAPI phonemes and phoneme groups that correspond to a viseme in US English.
trans-unit.target: Följande är en lista över 21 SAPI fonemen och phoneme grupper som motsvarar en viseme i amerikansk engelska.

trans-unit.source: |Viseme|Phoneme(s)| |------------|------------------| |0|silence| |1|ae, ax, ah| |2|aa| |3|ao| |4|ey, eh, uh| |5|er| |6|y, iy, ih, ix| |7|w, uw| |8|ow| |9|aw| |10|oy| |11|ay| |12|h| |13|r| |14|l| |15|s, z| |16|sh, ch, jh, zh| |17|th, dh| |18|f, v| |19|d, t, n| |20|k, g, ng| |21|p, b, m| For information about data associated with the `VisemeReached` event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: | Viseme | Phoneme(s) | |------------|------------------| |&0; | tystnad | |&1; | ae, ax, ah | |&2; | aa | |&3; | ao | |&4; | entkoppling, ft, visst | |&5; | er | |&6; | y, iy, ih, ändra | |&7; | w, uw | |&8; | ur | |&9; | aw | |&10; | oy | |&11; | ay | |&12; | h | |&13; | r | |&14; | l | |&15; | s, z | |&16; | del, ch, jh, zh | |&17; | th, dh | |&18; | f, v | |&19; | d, t, n | |&20; | k, g, ng | |&21; | p, b, m | Information om data som är associerade med den `VisemeReached` händelse finns <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the current voice of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar information om den aktuella rösten för den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: When you initialize a new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: När du initierar en ny <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>, används standardvärdet system röst.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To configure the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object to use one of the installed speech synthesis voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Så här konfigurerar du den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>objekt som använder en av de installera tal sammanfattande rösterna kan använda den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>metod.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill ha information om vilka röster installeras med hjälp av <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>metoden och <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>klass.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the current voice of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar information om den aktuella rösten för den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the voice of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Utlöses när röst den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> ändringar.

trans-unit.source: For an example and information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Ett exempel och information om data som är associerade med händelsen finns <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can change the voice that the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> uses with any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> methods or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ändra rösten som den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>använder någon av de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A>metoder eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the output volume of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Hämta eller anger volymen av den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: Returns the volume of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref>, from 0 through 100.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar mängden av <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref>, mellan 0 och 100.
